channel.title: Ancient Curse ULTIMATE Pking Server [PI]
channel.description:
[img]http://i36.tinypic.com/2q3515h.png[/img] Repost because its completely different.
Well, I love PK'ing so ive decided to try and unique pking server (because every pk server is generic). The base is new era, and Im pretty sure the client is nicknames.
This is my first packaged server ive ever looked at, don't go flamin ;).
[B][U][I]Currently Finished:[/I][/U][/B] [B]-Converted to PvP world.[/B] -Added PvP levels increasing the further north you go [B]-Removed teleporting in combat[/B] -Edited donator interfaces and added.. Open bank anywhere (not in combat or in pvp zone) Restore to full hp and auto pot combat stats [B]-Added vannaka giving PK tasks[/B] -Made tasks save to character file [B]-Added a double point bonus if you follow your task[/B] -Fixed bug where any player could give a main pkp [B]-Changed PvP store[/B] -Changed some other shop values [B]-Added stalls at home[/B] -Created a skillcape store [B]-Removed walls and doors at lumbridge home, set that as home[/B] -Changed starter so you can get right to pking [B]-Added click levelling system[/B] -Changed teleports with did you know hints [B]-Added randomised PkP[/B] -Made makeover mage interface appear on first acc login [B]-Added a walkback tutorial system to home[/B] -Added a walkback tutorial system to the wild [B]-Made all supplies cost nothing[/B] -Removed random event for stalls [B]-Fixed all bugs regarding pk tasks[/B] -Added a Jframe to the client [B]-Fixed the clients background[/B] -Added bugs, a squire and a guide to home to teleport people [B]-Added combat levels to weapons tab[/B]
[B][U][I]To Be Completed:[/I][/U][/B] [B]-Remove all exp gain (excluding non combat)[/B] -Stop barrows breaking on death [B]-Add a killstreak system[/B] -Make vengeance require 94 magic [B]-Add a training area[/B] -Add objects in the training area that give food, health + more [B]-Add a home made minigame for PkP[/B] -Add ::donate
[I][U][B]Pictures:[/B][/U][/I]
[IMG]http://img811.imageshack.us/img811/6315/ingame1.png[/img] [IMG]http://img291.imageshack.us/img291/4011/ingame2.png[/img] [IMG]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/6306/ingame3.png[/img] [IMG]http://img810.imageshack.us/img810/8700/ingame4.png[/img]
[I][U][B]Detailed information:[/B][/U][/I] [I][U][B]Pk Tasks.[/B][/U][/I] Vannaka who is placed at home gives players instead of monster killing tasks; pk tasks. These pk tasks can set the player to kill main accounts, zerker accounts or pure accounts.
Im hoping this will ensure a constant stream of people all being either pures zerkers or mains; rather then everyone being maxed out.
Following your tasks gives double pkpoints, which are spent in the shop.
[IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/nvclrq.gif[/img]
[U][I][B]New Donation Tab[/B][/I][/U] I've tried to make donators be more powerful then other players, but not be overpowered. So i've given them these options that they can access at any time.
-Total Restore Restores your health and prayer fully, also max potting all combat stats. (cant be used in pvp zones or combat) -Special regen Fully restores your special (cant be used in pvp zones or combat) -Access bank Lets you access your bank anywhere. Thinking of adding a 10 min timer on all of these. (cant be used in pvp zones or combat)
Home made pictures :D [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/15riq6s.gif[/img]
[I][U][B]Randomised Information[/B][/U][/I] As there will be no teleports in my server, ive decided to add did you know hints into the teleports. Ive also randomised them and made them interesting every time you refresh the interface.
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/33xh941.gif[/img]
[I][U][B]Training[/B][/U][/I] 100% my click levelling system on PI
[B]Im going to try and get this released ASAP :D, so ill be needing some beta testers soon if people are interested.[/B]
Feel free to post any suggestions/hate/opinions here to what you think would make this an even better pk server then it already is.

item.title: Ancient Curse ULTIMATE Pking Server [PI]
item.dc:creator: @DemisePking DemisePking
item.description:
@DemisePking wrote:

[quote=“glestrts, post:3, topic:360082”][quote author=DemisePking link=topic=456519.msg3341332#msg3341332 date=1284394960]
As there will be no teleports in my server, ive decided to add did you know hints into the teleports. Ive also randomised them and made them interesting every time you refresh the interface.
[/quote]
Why not just remove the teleport spells from the interface?

Im thinking of adding objects all around the area that people can click for a full pack of food, pots or whatever they would need to train certain stats. Im also thinking of adding different zones for people to train in that you need a certain level to enter.

OMG! it’l be project czar all over again. Clicking stuff for rewards lol.

@topic, goodluck man, its nice to see that you’ve kept up with this.[/quote]

Removing the teleport spells from the interface is a good fucking idea
Thank you.

Also haha nah not rewards exactly also ive removed that now and added click levelling
Thanks for goodluck

Read full topic

item.title: Ancient Curse ULTIMATE Pking Server [PI]
item.dc:creator: @DemisePking DemisePking
item.description:
@DemisePking wrote:

2q3515h.png700×200

Repost because its completely different.

Well, I love PK’ing so ive decided to try and unique pking server (because every pk server is generic). The base is new era, and Im pretty sure the client is nicknames.

This is my first packaged server ive ever looked at, don’t go flamin ;).

Currently Finished:
-Converted to PvP world.
-Added PvP levels increasing the further north you go
-Removed teleporting in combat
-Edited donator interfaces and added…
Open bank anywhere (not in combat or in pvp zone)
Restore to full hp and auto pot combat stats
-Added vannaka giving PK tasks
-Made tasks save to character file
-Added a double point bonus if you follow your task
-Fixed bug where any player could give a main pkp
-Changed PvP store
-Changed some other shop values
-Added stalls at home
-Created a skillcape store
-Removed walls and doors at lumbridge home, set that as home
-Changed starter so you can get right to pking
-Added click levelling system
-Changed teleports with did you know hints
-Added randomised PkP
-Made makeover mage interface appear on first acc login
-Added a walkback tutorial system to home
-Added a walkback tutorial system to the wild
-Made all supplies cost nothing
-Removed random event for stalls
-Fixed all bugs regarding pk tasks
-Added a Jframe to the client
-Fixed the clients background
-Added bugs, a squire and a guide to home to teleport people
-Added combat levels to weapons tab

To Be Completed:
-Remove all exp gain (excluding non combat)
-Stop barrows breaking on death
-Add a killstreak system
-Make vengeance require 94 magic
-Add a training area
-Add objects in the training area that give food, health + more
-Add a home made minigame for PkP
-Add ::donate

Pictures:




Detailed information:
Pk Tasks.
Vannaka who is placed at home gives players instead of monster killing tasks; pk tasks. These pk tasks can set the player to kill main accounts, zerker accounts or pure accounts.

Im hoping this will ensure a constant stream of people all being either pures zerkers or mains; rather then everyone being maxed out.

Following your tasks gives double pkpoints, which are spent in the shop.

New Donation Tab
I’ve tried to make donators be more powerful then other players, but not be overpowered. So i’ve given them these options that they can access at any time.

-Total Restore
Restores your health and prayer fully, also max potting all combat stats.
(cant be used in pvp zones or combat)
-Special regen
Fully restores your special
(cant be used in pvp zones or combat)
-Access bank
Lets you access your bank anywhere.
Thinking of adding a 10 min timer on all of these.
(cant be used in pvp zones or combat)

Home made pictures

Randomised Information
As there will be no teleports in my server, ive decided to add did you know hints into the teleports. Ive also randomised them and made them interesting every time you refresh the interface.

Training
100% my click levelling system on PI

Im going to try and get this released ASAP :D, so ill be needing some beta testers soon if people are interested.

Feel free to post any suggestions/hate/opinions here to what you think would make this an even better pk server then it already is.

Read full topic
